data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
George: What kind of music will you be performing this coming weekend?
Bill: This ____ I ____ be ____ classical, although I have ____ practicing ____ my ____ band ____.
George: I ____ have ____ to ____ and ____ you, but ____ I ____ be ____.
Bill: That's alright, you can always catch the classical show the next time we perform.
data.partBlankContent:
George: What kind of music will you be performing this coming weekend?
Bill: This wee____ I wi__ be pla____ classical, although I have be__ practicing wi__ my ro__ band t__.
George: I wo___ have pla____ to co__ and s__ you, but unfort_______ I wi__ be unava______.
Bill: That's alright, you can always catch the classical show the next time we perform.
data.answer:
乔治:这个周末你要表演什么类型的音乐?
比尔:这个周末我将演奏古典乐，虽然我也一直在和我的摇滚乐队练习。
乔治:我本来打算来看你的，但不幸的是我没空。
比尔:没关系，下次我们表演的时候你总可以去看古典演出。
